name: Corpse Clone
description:
First game jam! Very stressful but a lot of fun. In Corpse Clone, you play as a clone on a space station. Every time you die you come back as a different clone but the corpses stay where they were. Use the bodies to help progress the levels.

Made with 001 Game Creator by Saben Studios (Tyler Saben).

This game was a submission of the Wowie-Jam 3.0 game jam hosted by Jonas Tyroller
